        "interval":2,
        "states": {
            // "good": 95,
            "warning": 30,
            "critical": 15

        "format": "{icon}  {capacity}%",

"custom/music": {
  "format": "  {}",
  "exec": "mpc current -f '%artist% - %title%' || echo",
  "interval": 2,
  "tooltip": false,
  "on-click": "mpc toggle",
  "on-click-right": "mpc next",
  "on-click-middle": "mpc prev",
  "on-scroll-up": "mpc volume +5",
  "on-scroll-down": "mpc volume -5",
  "max-length": 50
}
  "custom/music": {
    "format": "  {}",
    "escape": true,
